item_category: Engineered and tested by Amazon, Fire 7 is Amazon's best-selling tablet—now with 16 GB storage, faster quad-core processor, 1 GB of RAM and hands free with Alexa. Complete tasks, enjoy movies on the go, browse recipes or ask Alexa for the weather—making your every day easier.

review_text:
Perfect for kid YouTube 
But it’s very slow
I bought this month it’s so good
I bought this for my daughter and she is really happy with it

I bought this mainly because of the price and I needed something to browse stuff on social media platforms instead of using my phone.
Sadly my phone is way quicker than this tablet. Apart from being slow there is also a lack of memory.
On the plus side it's easy to use and is ok for watching stuff on YouTube.

Bought as a replacement for a defunct Kindle.
Very easy to use and set up.
Bigger than the phone for the Googling in your life. Yes it does run google. 
Plenty of apps to keep everyone happy.

I bought this for my sons 4th birthday so he can watch Netflix and YouTube, it works perfectly for what we wanted it for! Planning on buying one for my daughter's birthday as she loves it too! Cant go wrong at such a cheap price.
All round great tablet

This is excellent value considering the other options that are on the market. This is 1 of 3 in our family and provides the opportunity to watch TV shows and YouTube in bed without a television, which we don't have the space for in the bedroom.

We do not read on these devices as our preference is the kindle paperwhite, but on the odd occasion it was used to read the experience was more than satisfactory.
The tablet is tied into Amazon unable to access the apps without an Amazon account. Had bought for my mum but now stuck with it.
Well worth the money easy to use just what I need to order from and keep in touch with the familey.
Has everything I want on it, small so easy to take with you anywhere. But the battery life isn't great

Still get bombarded with Amazon ads so really wish I had spend a few more pounds and bought a Lenovo or similar

Get this device if you have even considered it!

Bought this to be able to make it kid proof. My son is forever watch videos unsuitable for his age. This tablet just for that, is fantastic!! 
You can set up Amazon kids on it which already makes sure that your kids can’t do anything they shouldn’t. With loads and loads of things included for them to do. Including games, videos and books. 
You can set screen time limits. It has night mode on it, for those watch anything in a darker room. I can’t say enough! I’m very impressed!

I left another review on the battery as i brought 2.  So i'll keep this one to the usability.
In kids mode i don't like it, it has lots of games but you have to download everything and they are confusing between a book, game or video or youtube clip.  Much prefer the standard mode and download what apps you want, prime video can only be viewed via standard mode anyway, and alot of apps also only work in standard mode.

I read alot of reviews to start with and I was nervous about the battery life not lasting. Immediate on set up i discovered easy ways to combat this. These are for kids use so straight away location off, alexa off, weather off etc. I find the battery lasts just fine for kids having a few hours occasionally, and i try to remember to turn them off when not in use. Only takes seconds to reboot anyway and the kids could do with learning a bit of patience.
Got this for my little girl. Ideal for the price

I say again its GREAT at what it does but I bought the wrong thing

So I wouldnt recommend it for a child particularly.  It is going to take us some research to get it working how we want safely for a young child.
